radiographic_examinations.findings: Dependent atelectasis bilaterally. No focal consolidations. Mild central intrahepatic biliary dilatation. A 1.4 cm splenule seen inferiorly. Significant circumferential wall edema in at least 10 cm segment of descending colon with mild surrounding fat stranding. Diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon noted. Numerous prominent periaortic lymph nodes measuring up to 8 mm in short axis.
